dcterms:description: The LPR4M dataset is the largest publicly available multi-modal dataset that covers 34 categories and comprises three modalities (image, video, and text). It includes 3,955,181 pairs of video-images for training and 20,079 pairs for testing, encompassing a diverse range of scenes.
dcterms:title: LPR4M

dcterms:creator: Marco Godi
Christian Joppi
Geri Skenderi
Marco Cristani
dcterms:description: The MovingFashion (MF) dataset contains only one category of fashion clothing with two modalities (image, video), comprising 15,045 pairs in the training set and 1,341 pairs in the test set.
dcterms:title: MovingFashion (MF)
